attributes.action: Government needs to increase the wages of retail/food employees due to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: These people are putting their health at risk for minimum wage in order to provide vital services during covid 19 outbreak.
attributes.background: Financial support to be offered to food and shop workers in the UK in order to keep this vital service operational

rejection.details:
The Government sets National Minimum Wages, but these apply equally to all industries, and individual employers are responsible for deciding what to pay their staff, provided it meets legal requirements.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reward key workers who have continued to work during the coronavirus outbreak, if this is something you would like to see.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 
www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
